items.title: Stories
items.summary: All my paintings start with a story. The stories going through transformations and often take twists and turns until…
items.content_html: All my paintings start with a story. The stories going through transformations and often take twists and turns until I decide to finish it start a new story.

Exploring Ideas
items.summary: My art reflects experiences and feelings that influence me in large and small ways every day. Art tells a…
items.content_html: My art reflects experiences and feelings that influence me in large and small ways every day. Art tells a story with chapters reflecting people and events around me at a specific time in life.

items.title: Aquarelle Melodies
items.summary: Mostly, I paint with oil paints and often add ripped paper or found objects such as feathers or petals…
items.content_html:
Mostly, I paint with oil paints and often add ripped paper or found objects such as feathers or petals for texture. When I travel, or sketch ideas, I like to use watercolour paint. 

These small paintings are  like melodies to a theme that popped into my head or I create them to play with a theme for an oil painting.
